== Panoor (CT) (627288) ==

Panoor (CT) is a town in the [[Thalassery]] taluka of [[Kannur]] district with an area of 8.54 sq. km. and harbouring 3590 households with total population of 17438 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kannur]] is at a distance of 33 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 492 km. Male population is 7834 and female population is 9604. Scheduled Caste population is 139 and Scheduled Tribes population is 60. Census Location Code of the town is 627288<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 86 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 68 km. Railway station is at Thalassery at a distance of 11 km.
